thing.title: (Updated) Screw-cap container
thing.author: MaskedRetriever
thing.description: With the thread generator, Screw-top containers aren'tquiteautomatic, but they're close.This is uploaded more as an advertisement of the screw thread script-- rolling one's own containers should be pretty much a snap with it!Note!Edit:Added the Blender file. This should make it even easier to scale this model to whatever size and height/diameter ratio you want!
